lead_paragraph: Less than a week before the opening of the Olympics, IOC leaders will meet in Rio de Janeiro this weekend to review the final preparations for the games and deal with the fallout from the doping scandal that has led to the exclusion of more than 100 Russian athletes.

headline.print_headline: IOC Board to Review Rio Final Preparations, Russia Doping
headline.main: IOC Board to Review Rio Final Preparations, Russia Doping
